summary: This is a search and seizure warrant issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York, authorizing the search of Jeffrey Epstein's residence at 9 East 71st Street in New York City. The warrant seeks evidence related to violations of sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy, specifically targeting electronic devices and media containing communications, photographs, and records concerning victims.

persons.name: Henry Pitman
persons.context: Issued the search and seizure warrant for the premises at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY, related to violations of sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy.

events.title: Issuance of Search Warrant
events.description: U.S. Magistrate Judge Henry Pitman issued a search and seizure warrant for Jeffrey Epstein's residence at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY, authorizing the search for evidence related to sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York
keyFacts: The search warrant targets Jeffrey Epstein's New York City residence at 9 East 71st Street for evidence of sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy.
The warrant authorizes seizure of electronic devices and storage media containing communications, photographs, and records related to victims or potential victims.
Specific items sought include nude or sexually suggestive photographs of individuals who appear to be teenage girls or younger, and child erotica.
The warrant allows for forensic imaging of devices and detailed review techniques including keyword searches and metadata analysis.
The legal basis for the search is violations of Title 18, United States Code, Sections 1591 (sex trafficking of minors) and 371 (conspiracy).
